00012 #ifndef SSHT_ERROR
00013 #define SSHT_ERROR
00014 
00015 
00016 #include <stdio.h>
00017

00019 #define SSHT_ERROR_GENERIC(comment)                                     \
00020   printf("ERROR: %s.\n", comment);                                      \
00021   printf("ERROR: %s <%s> %s %s %s %d.\n",                               \
00022          "Occurred in function",                                        \
00023            __PRETTY_FUNCTION__,                                         \
00024            "of file", __FILE__,                                         \
00025            "on line", __LINE__);                                        \
00026   exit(1);
00027 
00028 #define SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(pointer)                             \
00029   if(pointer == NULL) {                                                 \
00030     SSHT_ERROR_GENERIC("Memory allocation failed")                      \
00031   }
00032 
00033 
00034 #endif
